levels.description: Lose <@ba.vdown>{hp_ratio:0%}</> HP every second, Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</> and attacks change to firing <@ba.vup>{attack@times}</> times with <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK at random enemies within Attack Range
